source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video features a scenic daytime view of a bustling canal in Venice, Italy. The camera, positioned on a moving boat, glides along the waterway, capturing views of historic buildings and various other boats. The scene is lively with the movement of gondolas, water taxis, and other vessels on the water.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video features a scenic daytime view of a bustling canal in Venice, Italy. The camera, positioned on a moving boat, glides along the waterway, capturing views of historic buildings and various other boats. The scene is lively with the movement of gondolas, water taxis, and other vessels on the water.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides along a winding mountain road during the early morning, passing through dense forest and open meadows. The camera follows the lead cyclist as they accelerate around sharp turns, while several others trail behind in single file. Occasionally, a hiker crosses the path, prompting the cyclists to slow down before continuing their ascent.
